statements: DELETE FROM high_risk_patients WHERE age > 60 AND risk_factor = 'High Risk';
DELETE FROM high_risk_patients WHERE patient_id = 100 AND age > 65;
DELETE FROM high_risk_patients WHERE risk_factor = 'High' AND monitoring_required = TRUE;
DELETE FROM patient_conditions WHERE condition_id = 5 AND patient_id = 10;
DELETE FROM high_risk_patients WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' AND age > 60;
DELETE FROM Interventions WHERE patient_id = 5 AND intervention_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate < 60 AND blood_pressure = 'High';
